resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This jagged abstract shape not only represents the storm occuring beneath the summit, but also mimics the shape of Mt. Fuji itself.
resource.chars: This jagged abstract shape not only represents the storm occuring beneath the summit, but also mimics the shape of Mt. Fuji itself.
